Text: This show was AWFUL! I give it 1 season,then cancelled.
they trying to bring this crap back? Did they get lucas or speilberg on board or something...?

I think the worst part about this show is the anorexic bitch playing the lead.

They try to play her off as being hot, she is not, she barely has an ass, and the rest of her are bones sticking out from badly tanned skin.

There is no way she has the stamina for any of the action scenes she supposedly does, and most laughable of all is when a bad guy picks her out in a room filled with women all a thousand times hotter then her... WTF where they thinking, that was just comical.
Full season Ep. 1 - 16 available in AVI format at http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6203388/Nikita_Season_1_Ep._1_-_16_Complete_%5Bfun-tv%5D

Good uploads & good quality, thanks!
